main event: Two objects appeared as bright lights of varying colors from white to red, remaining still for two minutes before moving rapidly.
interesting points: The sighting was confirmed by a civilian observer,The objects resembled bright stars but had no discernible shape,The observation lasted for about 2 minutes,The observer reported clear weather conditions with unlimited visibility,Investigators noted that there were jet aircraft in the area during the time of the sighting.
witness description: a 26-year-old soil conservationist from the U.S. Department of Agriculture
